### About this site


This page includes my resume, as well as my email, LinkedIn, and GitHub links. In addition, the three figures in Problem2 are：

<p class="custom-indent">• Box plot of hygiene ratings for restaurants with the ten most popular cuisines in Manhattan</p>

<p class="custom-indent">• In the five years from 2013 to 2017, a line chart showing the proportion of all restaurants in different cuisines receiving A grades in each year</p>

<p class="custom-indent">• Histogram of the cumulative number of A-level restaurants contained in different zipcode regions</p>


The source code can be found from: [https://github.com/chenshuopan6/chenshuopan6.github.io]



The packages and R version are shown below:
